answers.text:
Hi Rick, 
Thank you for your question on tracking facilities and building components. Here are some resources, which I believe will help you answer your question. I have yet to see a completely comprehensive system on the Knowledge Network but these likes will be a good starting point. If anyone has any other sources to share on this topic please add them to the Knowledge Network! 
•   Energy Efficient County Buildings discusses tracking facilities through the lens of sustainability and how they bench mark different aspects of buildings. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/304706
•   Here is a previously answered question about facilities and building management which discusses tracking in the answer. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/21293
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Rick Terway
text: Does anyone have a system set up for tracking the major components of buildings and grounds, such as HVAC components Date of installation, life expectancy, estimated cost to replace?  This would include all systems plumbing, electrical, irrigation, HVAC and other maintenance items etc.   Any thoughts or systems used would be helpful.
title: Facilities tracking
